class_notes: Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from May 26 - July 4, 2022. Apply online at studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: This course explores current chemical research at an advanced level. Students will encounter specialized problems at the frontiers of chemistry by drawing on literature as well as presentations by guest speakers from industry, government, and academe, including the Emory community.
